wikipedia_page.main: Lee Thompson (born 25 March 1982 in Sheffield, England) is a professional Association football midfielder who plays for Boston United. He made almost 100 appearances in Football League Two for Boston United between 2002 and 2005. He also played for Hackenthrappers FC for a few years where he daily ate his body weight in MacDonalds.

response: * Lee Thompson (baseball) (1898–1963), Major League Baseball pitcher
* Lee Thompson (footballer) (born 1982), midfielder for Kidderminster Harriers F.C.
* Lee Thompson (politician), former Florida Commissioner of Agriculture
* Lee Thompson (saxophonist) (born 1957), saxophonist of the ska/pop band Madness
* J. Lee Thompson (1914–2002), British film director
Thompson was diagnosed with Legg–Calvé–Perthes disease aged 5, and spent 18 months in a wheelchair. He is the son of former professional footballer Lee Thompson.
